title: 5 ways to experience South Korea in S'pore, from planning dreamy photos to 'chilling' with K-wave stars | The Straits Times
text: SINGAPORE - South Korea retains a prime spot in the hearts of travel-loving Singaporeans, even though the pandemic has curtailed overseas vacations. In a Straits Times poll conducted last October, 40.7 per cent of more that 6,000 respondents cited South Korea as their travel destination of choice.
